name: Kamo WW
description: '''Kamohelo Thabiso Pule''' (born 6 June 2002), professionally known as '''Kamo WW''', is a South African [[influencer]], [[singer]], [[Celebrity|tv personality]] and actor. He is best known for his starring role on the [[YouTube]] original reality show ''Birth Of Stars''. He made his first debut single "Abafana" in 2023 and became the first openly queer [[amapiano]] artist.
